The presence of a short 11: second clip of Rahul Gandhi speaking, where he can be heard saying that he will go to London and his children will study in America.
The tweet by BJP Mahila Morcha national: charge of social media Priti Gandhi, which includes the video clip.
The tweet by Akali Dal MLA Manjinder S S: which also includes the same video clip.
The fact: checking done by Alt News, which found that the clip was taken out of context from Rahul Gandhi's full speech in Latur, Maharashtra, where he was referring to Nirav Modi and Mehul Choksi.
